attributes.action: set aside the necessary funds to improve the railway Network in Devon & Cornwall and Somerset
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We petition the Prime Minister to set aside the necessary funds to improve the railway Network in Devon & Cornwall and Somerset

Re-open the old Southern Railway Line between Exeter and Plymouth

Improve the railway line Between Salisbury and Exeter. 

Build a new Railway line from Launceston to Tavistock
Re-Open the Tavistock to Gunnislake 
Re-Open the North Somerset Line for passenger use

Build a new Railway station at

Wellington

Collumpton
Exminster
South Brent
Plympton

In these days of rising fuel prices, the Govt should be reopening many of the railway lines around the country that Dr Beeching closed, especially in the South West where it is rural so that the majority of people can move from one place to another plus the use of light railways/trams in places like Bristol, Taunton, Exeter, Plymouth & Truro at a reasonable cost and and being an efficient mode of transport in today's environment.
